duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop cloud-based software solutions for customer systems and internal/external services
Participate in all aspects of the software development life cycle including planning, development, and unit testing
Work in an agile development environment and contribute to work definition, scoping, code reviews, and design reviews
Support Production services in a DevOps environment, including monitoring system health, deploying software, and participating in on-call rotation and incident handling
Support service initiatives adhering to best practices for security, scalability, cost, and overall performance
Create automated tests and deployment processes, and work with continuous integration tools
Collaborate with cross-functional teams in a highly collaborative environment

education_certification.credential: Degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
